entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow late this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
